game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality hangs in the balance. Players take on the role of a Chronomancer, tasked with navigating through ancient ruins and forgotten civilizations to repair the timestream.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player's awakening in a desolate wasteland, with no memory of who they are or how they got there. As they navigate this strange new world, they stumble upon an ancient artifact that reveals their connection to the timestream and sets them on a quest to restore order.
game.ending: With the timestream restored, the player must face off against the mastermind behind the time distortions: a powerful entity known only as 'The Devourer.' In a final, desperate bid to save reality, the player must harness all their knowledge and skills in a climactic showdown with The Devourer.
